Articles.Content: Hi Everyone. Yesterday at around 6:00 I took of on an epic 1hr 5mins journey around kerbin! I saw 2 Sunsets (1 entering the night side of Kerbin the second happened when I was approaching KSC. And one sunrise (entering day side) I did it with 640 units of fuel. I landed with about 60 unints left. Cheers all! Pictures in next post.
